attributes.action: be brave and scrap public sector pensions urgently.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public sector pensions are the main drain on the economy and yet public sectors workers can afford to buy their own pensions. They have more secure employment, better benefits, more holidays and better pay - yet they raise no money for the economy. Private workers pay 96p to public sector pensions for every pond spent on their own (if they even have one) - I need your help - sign this petition. The UK is currently committed to paying a steadily rising sum per annum leading to beyond one TRILLION pounds in the next 5 years- PER ANNUM!
